title: Navigate forwards to a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Seek' slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameSeek textualValue1Minute30Seconds5Minutes numericValue90IsNotConveyed orientationHorizontal minimumValue0IsNotConveyed maximumValue300IsNotConveyed

title: Navigate backwards to a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Seek' slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameSeek textualValue1Minute30Seconds5Minutes numericValue90IsNotConveyed orientationHorizontal minimumValue0IsNotConveyed maximumValue300IsNotConveyed

title: Request information about a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Seek' slider, read information about the slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameSeek textualValue1Minute30Seconds5Minutes numericValue90IsNotConveyed orientationHorizontal minimumValue0IsNotConveyed maximumValue300IsNotConveyed

title: Increment a slider by one step in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Seek' slider, set its value to 1 Minute 31 Seconds.

title: Decrement a slider by one step in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Seek' slider, set its value to 1 Minute 29 Seconds.

title: Increment a slider by fifteen steps in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Seek' slider, set its value to 1 Minute 45 Seconds.

title: Decrement a slider by fifteen steps in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Seek' slider, set its value to 1 Minute 15 Seconds.

title: Decrement a slider to the minimum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Seek' slider, set its value to 0 Seconds.

title: Increment a slider to the maximum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Seek' slider, set its value to 5 Minutes.
